actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

actions.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided that it has no creature {@condition grappled}. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6 damage) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
